data.title: How do I edit the movie files in The Simpsons: Hit & Run?
meta_keywords: Lucas' Simpsons Hit & Run Mod Launcher
data.meta_description: The best forum for discussing mods and tools for The Simpsons: Hit & Run.
data.text:
I am trying to edit the intro video by replacing it with a beta version.

The game videos format is .rmv (Radical Video Format) and them are uneditable!

How did Hipporeno in Army of cola evergreen buzz to edit the radical video,

or TOS ep.1 with the custom videoin radical video???

I tried to search online any converter or reader for RMV files to import another video in them,but the rmv files areso hard to edit....

PLEASE HELP ME!

Dan :-) :-(

3,430 views Â· 0 likes

Sending vote...

To add to this discussion, make sure "RequiredHack=IncreasedVideoResolutionSupport" is in your Meta.ini so that way you can add films that are at a higher resolution than 640x480. SHAR won't play them properly without this hack if they're above that resolution (technically SHAR supports a resolution slightly higher than that, but you're better off just using IncreasedVideoResolutionSupport so you don't have to worry about it).

2 likes

Sending vote...
